code-runner.executorMap.cpp: cd $dir ; if ($?) { g++ $fileName HelperFunctions.cpp date_class.cpp Book_class.cpp Session_class.cpp SessionManager_class.cpp BookManager_class.cpp CustomerUser_class.cpp AdminUser_class.cpp UserManager_class.cpp eBookSystemIO_class.cpp -o 0_eBookSystem } ; if ($?) { .\$fileNameWithoutExt.exe }
